name: How to Raise a Villain
description:
Villains are not born, they're raised! 

How to Raise a Villain is a casual, free-to-play, simulation game. The gameplay focuses on its visually cute, addicting and relaxing nature. It's simple to play yet challenging to master!

Step 1: ADOPT
Adopt 4 different villains! A pirate, a thief, an assassin and a con artist!
Behind their cute demeanor, each villain has its own unique personality and backstory.

Step 2: RAISE
Raise the villains with lots of care and love! Prepare their tools and food for their adventures towards the path of evil!

Step 3: SEND THEM OFF
Once you think they're ready, let them embark on their journeys to become a better villain! 

STEP 4: COLLECT PHOTOS
Villains will embark on their respective journeys and if you have prepared them well, they will return victoriously with gold, rare items and pictures from their journeys!

Features:
- Simple, casual gameplay for quick but addictive bursts
- Intuitive and easy to learn, no boring long tutorials but optional instead
- Visually pleasing graphics and cute characters to interact with
